folder.c

00001 
00002 #include "ext.h"
00003 #include "ext_common.h"
00004 #include "ext_strings.h"
00005 
00006 
00007 void *folder_class;
00008 
00009 /* first argument is folder name : is subdir of Max, otherwise starts with disk.
00010     subsequent arguments are file types to search for (default is TEXT and maxb)
00011 */
00012 
00013 #define MAXTYPES 128
00014 
00015 typedef struct _folder {
00016     t_object f_ob;
00017     short f_path;
00018     t_symbol *f_input;
00019     OSType f_types[MAXTYPES];
00020     long f_numtypes;
00021     void *f_countout;
00022     long f_outcount;
00023 } t_folder;
00024 
00025 void folder_bang(t_folder *x);
00026 void folder_types(t_folder *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00027 void folder_anything(t_folder *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00028 void folder_assist(t_folder *x,void *b,long m,long a,char *s);
00029 void *folder_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00030 void folder_lookup(t_folder *x);
00031 void folder_enumerate(t_folder *x);
00032 void folder_action(t_folder *x);
00033 
00034 t_symbol *ps_clear,*ps_append;
00035 long debug;
00036 
00037 int main()  
00038 {
00039     setup((t_messlist **)&folder_class, (method)folder_new, 0L, (short)sizeof(t_folder), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);   
00040     addint((method)folder_bang);
00041     addbang((method)folder_bang);
00042     addmess((method)folder_anything,    "anything", A_GIMME, 0);
00043     addmess((method)folder_anything,    "symbol",   A_SYM, 0);
00044     addmess((method)folder_types,       "types",    A_GIMME, 0);
00045     addmess((method)folder_assist,      "assist",   A_CANT, 0);
00046     finder_addclass("System","folder");
00047     ps_clear = gensym("clear");
00048     ps_append = gensym("append");
00049     debug = 0;
00050 
00051     return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void folder_action(t_folder *x)
00055 {
00056     x->f_outcount = 0;
00057     if (x->f_path == 0) {
00058         folder_lookup(x);
00059         if (x->f_path == 0)
00060             goto bag;
00061     }
00062     folder_enumerate(x);
00063 bag:
00064     outlet_int(x->f_countout,x->f_outcount);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void folder_bang(t_folder *x)
00068 {
00069     defer(x,(method)folder_action,0L,0,0L);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void folder_assist(t_folder *x,void *b,long m,long a,char *s)
00073 {
00074     if (m==1) {
00075         switch (a) {
00076             case 0: sprintf(s,"Path Name of Folder to List"); break;
00077         }
00078     } 
00079     else if (m==2) {
00080         switch (a) {
00081             case 0: sprintf(s,"File Name List, Connect to Menu"); break;
00082             case 1: sprintf(s,"Count of Items Listed"); break;
00083         }
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void folder_lookup(t_folder *x)
00088 {
00089     short path,err;
00090     char sourcename[512],filename[256];
00091     
00092     if (x->f_input) {
00093         strcpy(sourcename,x->f_input->s_name);
00094         err = path_frompathname(sourcename, &path, filename);
00095         if (err || filename[0]) {
00096             object_error((t_object *)x, "%s: not a folder",x->f_input->s_name);
00097             x->f_path = 0;
00098         }
00099         else {
00100             x->f_path = path;
00101         }
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void folder_anything(t_folder *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00106 {
00107     x->f_input = s;
00108     x->f_path = 0;
00109     folder_bang(x);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void folder_types(t_folder *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00113 {
00114     Byte type[4];
00115     long len=0,i;
00116 
00117     x->f_numtypes = 0;
00118     while (ac--) {
00119         if (av->a_type == A_SYM) {
00120             len = strlen(av->a_w.w_sym->s_name);
00121             for (i=0;i<4;i++) {
00122                 type[i] = (i>=len) ? ' ' : av->a_w.w_sym->s_name[i];
00123             }
00124             STR_TO_FOURCC(*((long *)type));
00125             sysmem_copyptr(type,&x->f_types[x->f_numtypes++],4L);
00126         }
00127         av++;
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 void *folder_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00132 {
00133     t_folder *x;
00134     
00135     x = (t_folder *)newobject(folder_class);
00136     x->f_countout = intout((t_object *)x);
00137     outlet_new((t_object *)x,0);
00138     x->f_input = 0;
00139     x->f_numtypes = 0;
00140     x->f_path = 0;
00141     x->f_outcount = 0;
00142     if (ac) {
00143         if (av->a_type == A_SYM)
00144         {
00145             x->f_input = av->a_w.w_sym;
00146         }
00147         if (ac > 1) {
00148             av++;
00149             folder_types(x,s,ac-1,av); // ddz 06/27/05 ac -> ac-1 bug fix
00150         }
00151     }
00152     if (!x->f_numtypes) {
00153         short numtypes;
00154         
00155         typelist_make((long *)x->f_types, TYPELIST_MAXFILES, &numtypes);
00156         x->f_numtypes = numtypes;
00157     }
00158     if (x->f_input)
00159         folder_lookup(x);       
00160     return x;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void folder_enumerate(t_folder *x)
00164 {
00165     void *fold;
00166     Boolean cleared = false, match;
00167     t_atom a;
00168     long type,i;
00169     char name[256];
00170     short savelock;
00171     t_fileinfo info;
00172     
00173     if (!x->f_path)
00174         return;
00175     fold = path_openfolder(x->f_path);
00176     if (!fold)
00177         return;
00178     a.a_type = A_SYM;
00179     while (path_foldernextfile(fold,&type,name,false)) {
00180         if (x->f_numtypes==0)
00181             match = true;
00182         else {
00183             match = false;
00184             if (!type) {
00185                 if (!path_extendedfileinfo(name,x->f_path,&info,(long *)x->f_types,x->f_numtypes,true))
00186                     type = info.type;
00187             }
00188             for (i = 0; i < x->f_numtypes; i++) {
00189                 if (type == x->f_types[i]) {
00190                     match = true;
00191                     break;
00192                 }
00193             }
00194         }
00195         if (match) {
00196             if (!cleared) {
00197                 savelock = lockout_set(true);
00198                 outlet_anything(x->f_ob.o_outlet,ps_clear,0,0);
00199                 lockout_set(savelock);
00200                 cleared = true;
00201             }
00202             a.a_w.w_sym = gensym(name);
00203             savelock = lockout_set(true);
00204             outlet_anything(x->f_ob.o_outlet,ps_append,1,&a);
00205             lockout_set(savelock);
00206             x->f_outcount++;
00207         }
00208     }
00209     path_closefolder(fold);
00210     
00211 }
